headline: Does New AI-Focused Colocation Momentum Change The Bull Case For Equinix (EQIX)?
summary: In recent weeks, analysts at Bank of America Securities and Deutsche Bank reinforced their positive views on Equinix, emphasizing its enterprise colocation leadership and role in AI-related digital infrastructure, while Options Technology deployed a new liquid-cooled high-density cage in Equinix's NY5 data center. Together, this upbeat research and advanced customer deployment underscore how Equinix’s interconnected data center ecosystem is increasingly aligned with AI and high-performance...

headline: Assessing Equinix (EQIX) Valuation After Renewed Analyst Optimism And AI Infrastructure Momentum
summary: Recent commentary on Equinix (EQIX) has centered on fresh analyst coverage and client deployments that spotlight its role in enterprise colocation and AI focused digital infrastructure, which is keeping the stock on many investors’ watchlists. See our latest analysis for Equinix. At a share price of US$791.27, Equinix has seen a 3.66% 1 month share price return but a 6.11% 3 month share price decline, and its 1 year total shareholder return of 13.97% decline contrasts with positive 3 and 5...
